Place your hand under your camera against a plain background with good lighting and tap Get Started. I’m not able to provide a biometric Could not receive response! Get Started Done Verifying Device Please wait while we automatically verify your device. Help OTP Checklist If your OTP is not being automatically read by the app, make sure of the following Your device contains the SIM for your registered mobile number. If OTP is not received before the timer runs out, please tap the Resend button. You don\'t switch apps when receiving an OTP. Other apps aren\'t appearing on top of the UBL app.
